summary: 7/13/1972. First 20 minutes are TVTV experimenting with nitrous oxide; interview with Newsweek journalist begins at 00:20:10. Twenty minutes of goofing with N20 followed by earnest, poolside interview with Newsweek journalist that figures into the completed tape.
